channel.title: CVE Feed for Openshift Enterprise -- openshift/apb-base
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Openshift Enterprise -- openshift/apb-base

item.title: CVE-2019-19348|2024-08-05T02:16:46.972Z -- openshift%20enterprise -- openshift%2Fapb-base
item.description: An insecure modification vulnerability in the /etc/passwd file was found in the container openshift/apb-base, affecting versions before the following 4.3.5, 4.2.21, 4.1.37, and 3.11.188-4. An attacker with access to the container could use this flaw to modify /etc/passwd and escalate their privileges.
